DbDetails.DbTable: mymeal.mymeal_diningbill m left join mymeal.mymeal_diningtable m0 on m.tableid=m0.tableid left join mymeal.mymeal_reserve m1 on m.reserveid=m1.reserveid left join mymeal.mymeal_enum m2 on m.statusid=m2.enumid left join mymeal.mymeal_member m3 on m.memberid=m3.memberid left join mymeal.mymeal_entrytype m4 on m.entrytypeid=m4.entrytypeid left join mymeal.mymeal_department m5 on m.departmentid=m5.departmentid left join mymeal.mymeal_workshift m6 on m.shiftid=m6.shiftid left join mymeal.mymeal_possite m7 on m.possiteid=m7.possiteid left join mymeal.mymeal_employee m8 on m.waiterid=m8.employeeid left join mymeal.mymeal_feemethod m9 on m.feemethodid=m9.feemethodid left join mymeal.mymeal_employee m10 on m.discountoperatorid=m10.employeeid left join mymeal.mymeal_employee m11 on m.operatorid=m11.employeeid left join mymeal.mymeal_businesstime m12 on m.timeid=m12.timeid left join mymeal.mymeal_diningbill m13 on m.masterbillid=m13.billid
